android.car

类 CarAppFocusManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.CarAppFocusManager

  • public final class CarAppFocusManager
extends CarManagerBase
    CarAppFocusManager allows applications to set and listen for the current application focus like active navigation or active voice command. Usually only one instance of such application should run in the system, and other app setting the flag for the matching app should lead into other app to stop.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarAppFocusManager.AppFocusRequestResult 
      static interface  CarAppFocusManager.AppFocusType 
      static interface  CarAppFocusManager.OnAppFocusChangedListener
      Listener to get notification for app getting information on application type status changes.
      static interface  CarAppFocusManager.OnAppFocusOwnershipCallback
      Listener to get notification for app getting information on app type ownership loss.

      • getActiveAppTypes

        public int[] getActiveAppTypes()
        Returns application types currently active in the system.

      • getAppTypeOwner

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAppTypeOwner(int appType)
        Returns the package names of the current owner of a given application type, or null if there is no owner. This method might return more than one package name if the current owner uses the "android:sharedUserId" feature.

      • isOwningFocus

        public boolean isOwningFocus(CarAppFocusManager.OnAppFocusOwnershipCallback callback,
                             int appType)
        Checks if listener is associated with active a focus
        参数:
        callback -
        appType -

      • requestAppFocus

        public int requestAppFocus(int appType,
                           CarAppFocusManager.OnAppFocusOwnershipCallback ownershipCallback)
        Requests application focus. By requesting this, the application is becoming owner of the focus, and will get CarAppFocusManager.OnAppFocusOwnershipCallback.onAppFocusOwnershipLost(int) if ownership is given to other app by calling this. Fore-ground app will have higher priority and other app cannot set the same focus while owner is in fore-ground.
        参数:
        appType -
        ownershipCallback -
        返回:
        APP_FOCUS_REQUEST_FAILED or APP_FOCUS_REQUEST_SUCCEEDED
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - If owner cannot be changed.

      • abandonAppFocus

        public void abandonAppFocus(CarAppFocusManager.OnAppFocusOwnershipCallback ownershipCallback,
                            int appType)
        Abandon the given focus, i.e. mark it as inactive. This also involves releasing ownership for the focus.
        参数:
        ownershipCallback -
        appType -

      • abandonAppFocus

        public void abandonAppFocus(CarAppFocusManager.OnAppFocusOwnershipCallback ownershipCallback)
        Abandon all focuses, i.e. mark them as inactive. This also involves releasing ownership for the focus.
        参数:
        ownershipCallback -

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
